dialogues.text: Well, I look good in red. KNOCKED UP - 139.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I look good in blue. The fighting continues. We could just throw off everyone and become Latin Kings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We both look good in gold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good choice. I would yell at you about driving so slow, except the baby's here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, these guys can honk all they want. I ain't going faster than twelve. It might take us around three hours to get home, though. The car moves slowly down the highway with a line of cars behind them. FADE OUT.
